Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true regarding the song 'Son of Sardaar'?
Options:
A. Aman Trikha contributed to the song 'Son of Sardaar'.
B. Himesh Reshammiya composed the soundtrack for 'Son of Sardaar'.
C. Both Aman Trikha and Himesh Reshammiya have sung the song 'Son of Sardaar'.
D. All of the above

Which of the following statements are true regarding the song 'Son of Sardaar'?
Options:
A. Aman Trikha has sung in the song 'Son of Sardaar'.
B. Himesh Reshammiya is a singer involved in the soundtrack.
C. Both Aman Trikha and Himesh Reshammiya have sung the song 'Son of Sardaar'.
D. Aman Trikha is not a singer.
Correct Answer: Both Aman Trikha has sung in the song 'Son of Sardaar' and Himesh Reshammiya is a singer involved in the soundtrack.

Which of the following statements are true regarding Ajay Devgn and the song 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal'?
Options:
A. a) Ajay Devgn sang 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal' in a Funk style.
B. b) Ajay Devgn performed 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal' in a Trance style.
C. c) 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal' is a song featured in the movie 'Son of Sardaar'.
D. d) Ajay Devgn is known for his roles in action films.
Correct Answer: a) Ajay Devgn sang 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal' in a Funk style., b) Ajay Devgn performed 'Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Mein Ye Sawaal' in a Trance style.
